Persons wishing to operate a fair on private or council owned land are required to give the Council notice prior to the holding of the event.

We need enter amount prior to the date the fair is taking place.

The Council will ensure that the rides are properly inspected and insured. The operator requires a licence from the council before the fair can be held.

More information regarding Amusement Licences link to pid 396 is available.
